医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
应对 STXBP1 相关疾病：揭示临床和发育结果研究人员检查了患有 STXBP1 基因相关疾病的个体的癫痫发作和发育史的合并患者年数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Navigating-STXBP1-lated-disorders-Unraveling-clinical-and-developmental-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Navigating-STXBP1-lated-disorders-Unraveling-clinical-and-developmental-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae08c2c4-1ffe-4d73-bd84-5be9e4e89ed0 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 03:09:00 -0500 Navigating STXBP1-related disorders: Unraveling clinical and developmental outcomes
颞成形素驱动的神经诱导刺激扩大的脑类器官的生长，增强神经上皮的形成研究人员检查了神经诱导过程中时间形态发生素梯度对脑类器官形成的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Temporal-morphogen-driven-neural-induction-spurs-growth-of-expanded-brain-organoids-with-enhanced-neuroepithelium-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Temporal-morphogen-driven-neural-induction-spurs-growth-of-expanded-brain-organoids-with-enhanced-neuroepithelium-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=017a8a89-fafd-46aa-a136-1a8250015f4d Mon, 04 Dec 2023 03:06:00 -0500 Temporal morphogen-driven neural induction spurs growth of expanded brain organoids with enhanced neuroepithelium formation
启动新计划以加速罕见病儿童获得个性化治疗今天，即 11 月 22 日星期三，政府宣布支持 Rare Therapies Launch Pad，这是一项新计划，将为患有罕见疾病的儿童提供获得个性化治疗的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-program-launched-to-accelerate-access-to-personalized-therapies-for-children-with-rare-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-program-launched-to-accelerate-access-to-personalized-therapies-for-children-with-rare-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01a02d7c-640f-4d7b-bd7e-5ee5aacd0e63 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:41:00 -0500 New program launched to accelerate access to personalized therapies for children with rare conditions
新的适应性临床试验旨在逆转进行性多发性硬化症引起的神经损伤有史以来第一个针对患有多发性硬化症的澳大利亚人的适应性临床试验将寻求逆转由进行性多发性硬化症引起的神经损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-adaptive-clinical-trial-aims-to-reverse-neurological-damage-caused-by-progressive-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-adaptive-clinical-trial-aims-to-reverse-neurological-damage-caused-by-progressive-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d14ff28f-6836-408a-a252-074982750986 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:38:00 -0500 New adaptive clinical trial aims to reverse neurological damage caused by progressive multiple sclerosis
英国生物银行推出世界上最大的遗传数据集作为医学研究的一个重要里程碑，英国生物银行今天（11 月 30 日星期四）公布了来自 50 万名参与者的全基因组测序的令人难以置信的新数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/UK-Biobank-unveils-worlds-largest-genic-data-set.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/UK-Biobank-unveils-worlds-largest-genic-data-set.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c113af4-204a-4a93-ae29-f3320c3fc30b Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:35:00 -0500 UK Biobank unveils world's largest genetic data set
开发出快速检测疟疾寄生虫基因变化的新技术科学家们开发出一种技术，只需使用游戏笔记本电脑和 Oxford Nanopore 的便携式 MinION 测序仪，即可快速可靠地检测加纳疟疾寄生虫的基因变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-technique-development-to-rapidly-detect-genic-changes-in-malaria-parasites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/New-technique-development-to-rapidly-detect-genic-changes-in-malaria-parasites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d10d52bd-8d4c-48ab-9451-c57118d5c1ed Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:28:00 -0500 New technique developed to rapidly detect genetic changes in malaria parasites
心脏基金会赞扬澳大利亚遏制电子烟使用的新电子烟改革心脏基金会对澳大利亚政府承诺进行旨在遏制电子烟在澳大利亚使用的新电子烟改革表示欢迎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Heart-Foundation-applauds-new-vaping-reforms-to-curb-e-香烟-use-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Heart-Foundation-applauds-new-vaping-reforms-to-curb-e-香烟-use-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8821dec-d39f-4ec5-9aca-a175d85a52be Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:24:00 -0500 Heart Foundation applauds new vaping reforms to curb e-cigarette use in Australia
研究发现护发产品中化学物质含量高普渡大学的研究人员发现，许多美国人早上的例行公事包括吸入几毫克可能对其健康有害的化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Study-finds-high-levels-of-chemicals-in-hair-care-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Study-finds-high-levels-of-chemicals-in-hair-care-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ce3ea2f-f9b7-404f-9801-be832226e6e3 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:22:00 -0500 Study finds high levels of chemicals in hair care products
创新的可穿戴设备可以显着改善姿势控制科学家开发了一种创新设备，帮助老年人训练姿势控制，最大限度地减少跌倒和相关伤害的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Innovative-wearable-device-can-significantly-improve-postural-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Innovative-wearable-device-can-significantly-improve-postural-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8dee465-f836-4403-a75b-18fc17247300 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:15:00 -0500 Innovative, wearable device can significantly improve postural control
UVA 研究人员发现乳酸菌如何帮助预防抑郁和焦虑弗吉尼亚大学医学院的研究人员发现，乳酸菌（发酵食品和酸奶中存在的一种细菌）如何帮助身体控制压力，并可能有助于预防抑郁和焦虑。这些发现为治疗焦虑、抑郁和其他心理健康疾病的新疗法打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/UVA-researchers-discover-how-Lactobacillus-may-help-prevent-depression-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/UVA-researchers-discover-how-Lactobacillus-may-help-prevent-depression-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=544581ae-2d2a-44c9-ab87-702bc6c6d1d6 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 01:09:00 -0500 UVA researchers discover how Lactobacillus may help prevent depression and anxiety
